[[File:J.R.R. Tolkien - New Lodge, Stonyhurst.jpg|frame]]
'''New Lodge, Stonyhurst''' is the title of a drawing by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], depicting a garden and guest house on the grounds of [[Wikipedia:Stonyhurst College|Stonyhurst College]], a Catholic boarding school in [[Wikipedia:Stonyhurst|Stonyhurst]], Lancashire. It was drawn by Tolkien in August [[1947]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?post_id=7768|articlename=New Lodge, Stonyhurst|dated=2 April 2011|website=Guide|accessed=4 May 2019}}</ref>

The drawing was reproduced as figure 28 in ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Artist and Illustrator|J.R.R. Tolkien: Artist & Illustrator]]''.<ref>{{HM|AI}}</ref>
